title: Right Hand Shift
exercise:

sss Sss sss Sss sss Sss sss Sss sss SSS sss SSS

title: Left Hand Shift
exercise:
jjj Jjj jjj Jjj jjj Jjj jjj Jjj jjj JJJ jjj JJJ
kkk Kkk kkk Kkk kkk Kkk kkk Kkk kkk KKK kkk KKK
lll Lll lll Lll lll Lll lll Lll lll LLL lll LLL
jkl Jkl jkl Jkl jkl Jkl jkl Jkl jkl JKL jkl JKL
helpText: We're now going to move into the opposite side of the keyboard. Use your left hand pinky finger to hold down the shift key.

title: Pattern forming... Now!

title: Back and Forth
exercise:
ttt Ttt ttt Ttt ttt Ttt ttt Ttt ttt TTT ttt TTT
yyy Yyy yyy Yyy yyy Yyy yyy Yyy yyy YYY yyy YYY
ggg Ggg ggg Ggg ggg Ggg ggg Ggg ggg GGG ggg GGG
hhh Hhh hhh Hhh hhh Hhh hhh Hhh hhh HHH hhh HHH
helpText: We're going to mix this one up a little bit!  For your <key>T</key> and <key>G</key> keys make sure you use your right pinky to shift and for your <key>Y</key> and <key>H</key> keys, use your left hand pinky to shift.

title: Gettin' Fancy
exercise:
aaa Aaa jjj Jjj sss Sss kkk Kkk ddd Ddd lll Lll
qqq Qqq uuu Uuu www Www iii Iii eee Eee ooo Ooo
zzz Zzz xxx Xxx nnn Nnn mmm Mmm ccc Ccc vvv Vvv
abc Def ghi Jkl mno Pqr stu Vwx yz
helpText: Now we're going to get crazy here and start shifting those shift keys back and forth!  Make sure you pay attention to using the proper hand to shift.
